snippet.title: Walrus Run Gameplay - May 2024
snippet.description:
Hey all, here's some new Walrus Run gameplay footage! You may notice some small changes from our first trailer.

As you can see, Walrus Run is compatible with Bongo-shaped controllers. This is not required, however, as you can play the game with modern gamepads and keyboard and mouse.

You may notice some of my claps didn't register. That's because I set the clap sensitivity threshold too low. You can raise the minimum sensitivity required to trigger an attack in the Options Menu - this way you don't have any accidental claps. I am also working on a feature to disable the microphone entirely, so you can just play with Bongo buttons, if you desire.

(And as you might have seen, there are techniques I used other than clapping to register a microphone input :D )

Lastly, I will be actively working on cutscenes this month, and I expect to launch a new trailer sometime this summer, featuring new cutscene footage!

Where to buy Walrus Run
Walrus Run on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2687610/Walrus_Run
Walrus Run on Itch.io: https://the-jam-games.itch.io/walrus-run

The Jam's Socials
The Jam Website: https://thejam.games/
The Jam Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheJam_Games
The Jam Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/thejam_games
Walrus Run Discord: https://discord.gg/wUHfrAEbgn

Donate to The Jam!
